name: vs-code-snippet-generator
title: VS Code snippet generator
description: This tool aims to simplify the process of converting a block of code into something that can be used in a VS Code snippet file, which is often a laborious process.
author: lewishowles

commands.name: create-vs-code-snippet
commands.title: Create VS Code snippet
commands.description: Create a new snippet block from the provided code.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
